author: jerenkrantz

author: philip
msg: This fixes most of the problems with 'svn diff -rREV1:REV2' introduced
when the server started sending diffs against the working copy.  It
also fixes issues #607 which was a consequence of the server diff
changes. Test #4 in diff_tests.py fails over ra_dav (issue #609) but
that was happening before this change.
sending diffs against the working copy over the first RA session. Set
(svn_client__get_diff_editor): Change order of code to make it
easier to follow. Move function documentation to header file.
(svn_client__open_ra_session): Add new arbitrary_wc parameter, which is
set when the working copy revision does not necessarily relate to the
repos_to_wc_copy): Pass new parameter to svn_client__open_ra_session.

author: gstein
msg: Add some ptr/len munging now that we have 1.3.10 (which enables
* svn_types.i: create a general PTR/LEN typemap for incoming buffers
* util.i: define typemaps for svn_stream_read() and svn_stream_write()
* svn_fs.i: use new PTR/LEN typemap for svn_fs_parse_id
